byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and NIKITA STEWART

abstract: Chirlane McCray, wife of New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, remains an influential voice in her husband's policy decisions, though she has not been nearly as involved in day-to-day operations as her detractors initially feared; McCray has instead chosen to focus on handful of issues that she relates to personally, overseeing review of city's mental health issues and emerging as public face of de Blasio's education initiatives.
lead_paragraph: Ms. McCray, the wife of Mayor Bill de Blasio, is far less involved in the day-to-day operation of New York than expected, instead hewing closely to issues that she relates to.

headline.main: Chirlane McCray, in Evolving Role and in Song, Finds Her Voice
headline.print_headline: In Evolving Role (and in Song), City’s First Lady Finds Her Voice
